comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: In 1911, for the fifth year in a row, the National Military shooting matches were held at Camp Perry, Ohio. Story from The New York Times, August 26, 1911: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9F01EEDB1531E2...

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:

comment._content:
Colonel C. B. Winders was another participant in the National Military Rifle Championship contests at Camp Perry, Ohio, in August, 1911:

comment._content: This is a photo of my great uncle, sister of Mary Ellen Sharpe McAyeal, spouse of Rev Robert A McAyeal DD of the first Presb Church, Oskaloosa, IA
